column1: US historical birth and death data, 1950-2100
Total births and deaths per year come from Our World in Data, "Births and deaths per year, United States: historic estimates with future projectsion based on the UN medium scenario"
Historical data birth rates and death rates per 1000 population and total population data are from Our World in Data, "Birth rate vs. death rate, 2023"
The original data source is "World Population Prospects", United Nations, https://population.un.org/wpp/
Forecast data for birth rates and death rates come from USA Facts, "What will America's population look like by 2100?"
